exm.mng: graffiti, scrawl, poor calligraphy, to write badly, to scribble
lit. crow and peacock make no sound, absolute silence (idiom); not a single voice can be heard, absolute silence
lit. crow's beak, fig. person who has made an inauspicious remark
(bird species of China) common raven (Corvus corax)
(bird species of China) Eurasian jay (Garrulus glandarius)
